message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $140. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $110 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $125.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm happy to continue negotiating with you. I can go down to $120, which is my minimum price. If you're serious about getting this product, this is the best I can offer.
